body:
I am not sure. 
The reason I added it is because CodeClimate uses the rubocop.yml only for the rubocop check, obviously, but it is doing other and [new checks as well](https://docs.codeclimate.com/v1.0/docs/default-analysis-configuration#section-maintainability-checks).
And we want to keep those, right? So, with the default settings copied, the behaviour of the Code Quality check as we have it now, should stay the same.
